post.description: Authenticates a user and returns an access token
Generates a new access token using the refresh token
Revokes the current user's access token

get.description: Retrieve a list of accounts with filters and pagination

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search by holder name or account number

post.description: Create a new bank account with client verification

get.description: Retrieve details of a specific account by its number

delete.description: Soft delete an account, change status to 'ferme' and delete associated transactions

patch.description: Update account and associated client information
Block an active account and calculate blocking dates

400.description: Account not active or invalid data

bearerAuth.description: JWT Authorization header using the Bearer scheme. Example: 'Authorization: Bearer {token}'
